HEADER.TEXT: I value creativity, enjoy tackling challenges, and pay close attention to detail, ensuring that every project I work on is both functional and well-crafted.

ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH_1: I am a Frontend Developer with 2 years of experience, specializing in Angular and TypeScript, based in São Paulo, Brazil. I have expertise in prototyping and developing responsive and interactive web applications using HTML, CSS, SASS, Tailwind, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, and Figma.
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH_2: I value collaboration, am proactive, and enjoy contributing ideas and insights to various projects I work on. Additionally, I strive to stay updated with the latest trends in my field, maintaining a study routine that includes Angular, TypeScript, UI libraries, best practices, and automated testing methodologies.
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH_3: In my free time, I enjoy going to the cinema, listening to music, and engaging in outdoor activities like cycling or hiking.

TOOLS.TITLE: Tools I use
TOOLS.TEXT: Here are some awesome tools I use to make development and problem solving easier and faster for my user.

STREAMING.NAME: Streaming Platform
STREAMING.ABOUT: This project is a streaming platform developed using Angular, consuming The Movie DB API, designed to provide a responsive experience on mobile devices and iPads. The main focus was on TypeScript for safer and scalable code, utilizing SCSS for styling, and applying best development practices.

POKEMON.NAME: Pokémon Deck Builder
POKEMON.ABOUT: Responsive application developed using Angular 16+, Tailwind CSS, and the Infragistics UI library. The application allows players to build card decks using the Pokémon TCG API.
